text:
Attached to this is a jar file with the source files and screenshots of a
visualizer I created. A nice JTable with the following (currently):

URL, Number of Samples, Min Response Time, Max Response Time, Average Response
Time, Error Percentage, and Sample Rate

Error Percentage is just something like "1.2%", and Sample Rate is a String like
"34.0/sec", or "55.5/min" .. 

Nothing is being sent to System.out .. Very clean.. Small memory footprint. 

I will continue enhancing this - just wanted to get this report in to get the
files rolled in if at all possible.
creator: jim@boutcher.com

It shows up on the listener list as "Aggregate Report" ..

text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
